title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Learning Design and Methodology Analysis for MOOC Quality Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with MOOC platforms and foundational knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: The five core dimensions (design, interaction, management, accessibility, methodology) of the MOOC quality evaluation framework can be explained
Fuzzy logic-based evaluation metrics can be used to analyze the qualitative level of actual MOOC content.
A quality assessment checklist reflecting employability-linked instructional design can be developed.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
